name: Hello Kitty's Big Fun Deluxe
storyline: Big Fun Piano is piano mini-game that allows you to play and learn songs. Big Fun Shapes is a game where you find shapes and colors. Big Fun Numbers is a game where you count and find objects in a scene. Big Fun Art is a creative tool that allows you to color in a coloring sheet and add stickers. Big Fun Storymaking is a game that allows you to read and create simple stories.
summary: Hello Kitty: Big Fun Deluxe is an edutainment game targeted at a PreK audience. It features Hello Kitty in 5 mini-games.
